original_text: And Moses wrote this law, and delivered it unto the priests the sons of Levi, which bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord, and unto all the elders of Israel.
korean_text: 또 모세가 이 율법을 써서 여호와의 언약궤를 메는 레위 자손 제사장들과 이스라엘 모든 장로에게 주고

sentences.original_text: and delivered it unto the priests the sons of Levi,
which bare the ark of the covenant of the Lord,
and unto all the elders of Israel.
